text.title: South Sudanese President Salva Kiir signs peace deal
text.head: South Sudanese President Salva Kiir signs peace deal
Sources

list.item: Denis Dumo. "South Sudan president Salva Kiir reluctantly signs peace deal" — The Sydney Morning Herald , August 27, 2015
Reuters. "South Sudan's President Salva Kiir signs peace deal despite 'serious reservations'" — The Guardian , August 26, 2015
Alastair Leithead. "South Sudan President Salva Kiir signs peace deal" — BBC News Online , August 26, 2015
